channel.title: Story on Hobbes Studios
channel.description: Recent content in Story on Hobbes Studios

item.title: Where's Snowball?
item.description: The easiest way to time travel is to do nothing. Where’s Snowball is a first-person stroll through a backseat personality looking for his lost friend.

item.title: Grilling Simulator
item.description: "Hill?! What hill?! I don’t see a hill!!“ Project Details Flip burgers, sear steaks, harass your neighbors, and avoid the wife.
